explanation: Welcome to Sherwood Science, the first Privacy by design tool for researchers. Let me guide you through the register process. </br>We will need few personal details start. This information is useful for statistical purposes and address you personally.
We use a double factor login, to ensure security measures in your account. This information will not be shared with anyone, any communication regarding Sherwood will be done within the platform.
Choose a password that is at least 6 characters long, that is easy to remember since this password will be used to encrypt information within Sherwood.

Here's your Personal Key to Sherwood. Please store it in a safe place. Think of it as a PUK number, in case you loose your password(from the previous step) you will be able to regain access using this key. Please confirm that you have stored it securely by introducing the text 'CONFIRM' in the input below.
email_error: This email is already in use
Este email ya se ha usado

account_registered: This account has already been activated
Esta cuenta ya ha sido activada

success_text: An email is coming your way, click on it to verify your account and in no time your will be able to create investigations with privacy as a priority
Un email está en camino, haz click en el link que hay dentro para verificar tu cuenta. Dentro de poco podrás crear investigaciones con la privacidad como prioridad
You are only one step ahead to participate in the investigation and grant access to your personal information, deny or see who has accesed it.
Estás a un paso de participar en la investigación y dar acceso a tus datos personales, denegarlo o ver quien ha accedido a ellos.

account_registered: This account has already been activated
Esta cuenta ya ha sido activada
